document.full_text: olympic track superstar carl lewis jumped into a race for new jersey state senate on monday, saying he wanted to help struggling children, families and seniors in the region where he grew up.
document.title: olympic superstar carl lewis enters politics
lines_and_colors: olympic track superstar carl lewis jumped into a race for new jersey state senate on monday, saying he wanted to help struggling children, families and seniors in the region where he grew up.
